attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: I got this app but then Donald Trump texted me saying that I was ugly and disgusting and he was gonna hack my phone and steal my information so pls don’t download this it’s for ur safety 😔✨

attributes.title: Russian Used App
attributes.review: I’ve seen multiple accounts of Russian propaganda displayed on this app. This man has also supported slavery and injustice for people that deserve it.

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: This is the worst app in the world it took a whole week to download and the app made my phone glitch a lot

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: It ate my dinosaur. So here is how. One day I wake up and I do my daily routine. I go to my dinosaur cage and he is eaten in half and on top of him a picture of this app.

attributes.title: Do not download
